## Summary

Describe the change and why it’s needed.

## Type of change
- [ ] Fix (non‑breaking)
- [ ] Feature (non‑breaking)
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Docs / chore

## How to test
Commands, seeds, or links to CI runs.

## Checklist
- [ ] Follows project style and minimal footprint
- [ ] Adds/updates docs if needed
- [ ] Passes smoke (`make codex-smoke`) locally or via CI
